## Load tidyverse
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
table1
table2
table3
```


```{r}
# Compute rate per 10,000
table1 %>%
  mutate(rate = cases / population * 10000)

table1 %>%
  count(year, wt = cases)

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(table1, aes(year, cases)) +
  geom_line(aes(group = country), colour = "grey50") +
  geom_point(aes(colour = country))
```
